doc:
Hope Summers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hope_Summers 0 Sarah Hope Summers (June 7, 1902 – July 22, 1979), better known as Hope Summers, was an American character actress known for her work on CBS's The Andy Griffith Show and Mayberry RFD, portraying Clara Edwards. Sarah_Hope_Summers ( June_7_,_1902 – July_22_,_1979 ) , better_known as Hope_Summers , was an_American_character_actress known for her_work on CBS 's_The_Andy_Griffith_Show and Mayberry_RFD , portraying Clara_Edwards .
